Dallon  is a commune in the Aisne department in Picardy in northern France.

' Dallon' is a commune in the Aisne department in Picardy in northern France.

It is located on the banks of the Somme and its marshes, and the canal Saint-
Quentin. Its former name is Dalonaie, on record in the year 1035.
